Name: Gloria Verde Resort
Description: Set just outside the popular resort town of Belek, Gloria Verde Resort is just a short stroll from Gloria Golf Club with its 45-hole golf courses, and guests can enjoy free shuttle services to and from the links. Rooms are comfortable and spacious with terrace or balcony, air conditioning and wireless internet access. Guests can enjoy healthy, low-calorie dining in the hotel's buffet or a la carte restaurants or a luxurious breakfast in bed with 24-hour room service. The hotel has a wonderful outdoor pool surrounded by carefully landscaped gardens as well as a games room, children's playground and fitness centre and spa. The area has been home to loggerhead sea turtles for thousands of years, and the hotel therefore takes special precautions so as not to disturb this special and endangered species. For golf enthusiasts as well as beach and nature lovers, this hotel offers the ideal retreat for a relaxing and fun-filled holiday.

Facilities.Name: All inclusive with alcoholic drinks own brands
